name: pg-aiguide/skills 模块
description: [模块级] pg-aiguide 项目的 skills 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/timescale/pg-aiguide

genes.title: skills 模块说明
genes.content:
- **[`view_skill`](API.md#view_skill)**  
  Exposes curated, opinionated PostgreSQL best-practice skills used automatically by AI coding assistants.

  These skills provide guidance on:
  - Schema design
  - Indexing strategies
  - Data types
  - Data integrity and constraints
  - Naming conventions
  - Performance tuning
  - Modern PostgreSQL features
